User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1

When I place a toolbarbutton between the urlbar and searchbar the urlbar-search-splitter vanishes, so the urlbar and searchbar can't be resized anymore. When I remove the button, urlbar-search-splitter is back again. 

Examing it with DOM inspector shows that the urlbar-search-splitter is completely gone from the node list once a button is placed between urlbar and searchbar.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. View --> Toolbars --> Customize
2. Move any toolbarbutton between urlbar and searchbar
3.

Actual Results:  
urlbar/searchbar can't be resized anymore

Expected Results:  
urlbar/searchbar should still be resizable
